title: Video Editor
job_overview:
What you’ll do

• Receive raw footage from our in-house team, then edit, colour-grade and master it for YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, reels and paid ads.
• Craft short-form and long-form cuts that showcase products, builds, customer stories and events.
• Add motion graphics, titles, sound design and basic VFX to keep viewers hooked.
• Ensure videos are optimised for various platforms in terms of format, length, and content style.
• Maintain a consistent DMW look, feel and tone across all assets.
• Stay ahead of editing trends, transitions and effects, proposing fresh ideas to the marketing squad.
• Manage multiple projects, revisions and deadlines in a cloud-based workflow (we use Upgrade to see actual info).

What skills you should have (We are happy to train you!!)

• Exposure to Premiere Pro, Final Cut or DaVinci Resolve.
• An understanding of video production processes (pre-production, shooting, editing, post-production).
• Ability to organise large media libraries and work asynchronously with a distributed team.
• Excellent written English and proactive communication—time-zone differences don’t slow you down.

Bonus skills you might have.

• Basic colour-grading skills and LUT creation.
• Familiarity with motion-graphics tools would be great. (After Effects preferred)
• Experience editing automotive, action-sports or outdoor lifestyle content.
• Knowledge of YouTube SEO and social-video analytics.
• Graphic-design abilities in Photoshop/Illustrator.

Why you’ll love working with us
• Reliable Salary, 13th month, medical and a possible annual performance bonus.
• We supply or subsidise the hardware/software licences you need to be lightning fast.
• Clear briefs, quick feedback loops and a friendly, no-ego team that values creativity.
• See your edits inspire a growing community of 4x4 and adventure enthusiasts.
